messages:
> " Well, he should have some chocolate at the very least" 
  *~Madam Pomfrey*

> "Bed rest and a large steaming mug of hot chocolate. I always find that cheers me up" 
* ~Albus Dumbledore*
> When you're sad, just remember that it is the dementors fault and it perfectly fine to eat loads of chocolate.
> Eat, you'll feel better...
> A day without you is like a day without chocolate...
> All you need is love but a little bit of chocolate now & then doesn't hurt.
> Loads of chocolate to the one who is sweeter than chocolate.
> In the cookie of life friends are chocolate chips.
> Besides chocolate you're my favourite!
> Chocolate will be my valentine!!
> Sending you a wish dipped in chocolate and sprinkled with love!
> Chocolate says I love you so much better than words!
> Hot chocolate is a hug in a mug!
> Don't think that chocolate is a substitute for love! Love is a substitute for chocolate.
> Chocolate is a happiness which we can eat.
> You melt my heart.
> Thanks for being such a sweet heart.
> Love is like a box of chocolates! it's sweet at first and then you wanna puke.
> I can't wait till February 15th...... half price chocolates.
> Why did the doughnut visit the dentist? he needed a filling.
> I like you a choco- lot.
> Someone accused me of stealing their kit kat....give me a break.
> Wake me up before you cocoa.
> Chocolate comes from cocoa which is a plant, therefore chocolate counts as a salad. the end.
> Have you heard about the chocolate box thief? he's always got a few twix up his sleeve.
> Talking at the local chocolate is frowned on. when I'm there I need to wispa...
> I just got over my addiction to chocolate,marshmallow and nuts I won't lie it was a rocky road!
> What melts in your mouth?.... I don't know what you were thinking of ! The answer was chocolate get your mind out the gutter!
> Here is a box of chocolate cauldrons for you! I apologise it seems I have eaten nearly all of them.
> Quick ! best eat these chocolate liqueurs before the Fat Lady eats them all. I heard she's eaten a whole box before.
> What's long, brown and weighs 45 grammes?......a chocolate wand.
> Chocolate finds a way to fight off Dementors or depression. Is essential if one is to become permanently happier. Excessive chocolate consumption cannot benefit either Muggle or wizard.
> Choo choo.... here comes the Choco-Loco you better catch it quick.
> Let's eat some balls.... Chocoballs they are full of strawberry mousse and clotted cream, don't keep these in your pocket.
> After a Dementor attack (or a miserable winter's day, in this situation), chocolate is called for. Remus Lupin always had some ready. Fancy a block?
> Not sure if I could ever be sick of chocolate.. I heard Harry was once.
> You're my lobster..... My chocolate lobster, of course!
> There is nothing better than a friend... Except a friend with chocolate.
> Anything is good if it's made of chocolate.
